attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
We suggest you seek more advice from Consumer Direct http://www.consumerdirect.gov.uk. 

If you would like the law changed, please spell out how, and be sure to leave out any reference to specific companies in your petition. 

As we can not verify your claims about the company in question, we can not publish your petition as it stands.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
